overview: Hot House Entertainment's Pack Attack gangbang series features one lucky man thrown to a pack of big-dicked, hole-hungy tops with trouble on their minds and monster cocks between their legs. Pack Attack 1 stars Kent North, the greediest pig-bottom on the planet, who demanded they find five of the biggest cocks in the business to try and tame his hungry hole. Do they succeed?
title: Pack Attack: Kent North
